website_summaries.verdict: Despite minor quality and durability concerns, this is a beautiful memorial that will serve as a heartfelt reminder of a beloved pet.
pros: A nicely crafted memorial made of cold cast ceramic that makes a nice keepsake or can be placed on a pet's gave or in a memorial garden
Comes in option of dog or cat
Customers have reported feeling comforted by the touching inscription, and the details of the sculpture
cons: At least one customer received a memorial with a blurry inscription
May not hold up to years of outdoor exposure to harsh winters

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it holds up good outside. Placed it over my sweet Charlie's grave
customer_reviews.text: Hoping it holds up good outside. Placed it over my sweet Charlie's grave. My old boy was a Chocolate Lab, decided to paint the dog. Used waterproof paint and it looked amazing! I was very impressed with the amount of detail in the fur, nose and nails. The wording looked a little hastily painted but overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet memorial stone
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet message, and not too heavy or clunky. A good size decorative memorial to put in a garden or even indoors. I got this as a gift for a friend, and I'm unsure of how it holds up outside yet, but if I hear anything either way will update my review to include it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Painted to match my mother’s black Lab.
customer_reviews.text: My mother’s dog was a black Lab so I painted the memorial stone with Outdoor acrylic paint and added her name to make it more personal. I can’t wait to give it to my mother so she can place it over the area where she buried her best friend’s ashes and hopefully it will bring her comfort and make her smile. The details in the dog are so perfect, the hair lines the face, ears, nose, paws, tail, ... everything!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A very nice statue....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this statue as a memorial to our beloved Chocolate Lab who we recently lost. We started a little flower garden in his honor with this figurine as a center piece. I wish It would have been bigger, but it was the best depiction of our best friend we could find.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice memorial for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, beautiful saying and the way the dog is laying reminds me so much of my beloved companion. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Special memorial for a friend
customer_reviews.text: 2 years ago, my wife and I got one of these but it was for a cat that we lost. This one I purchased for a classmate who lost her precious dog that she had raised all its live. Pets are family members and should always be remembered. Thank you for supplying this item for people that cherish all their fur children
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Memorial Stone to remember our furry friend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This pet memorial stone looks exactly like our beloved 11 year old lab whom recently passed away right down to the crossed paws!
customer_reviews.author: YoungIntheUSA

customer_reviews.title: Nice stone made with a good material
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product to remember your loved furry friend... We had to take the sad and hard decision to put our 14 year old companion to sleep and this stone had the perfect phrase...
customer_reviews.author: Anabelle De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: Memorial to Joey
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a bit overpriced because it is not very big...but...it was just what I wanted in sentiment and shape. Seller was great and product was well packed. Miss my pet Joey...was 18 years old when he passed.
customer_reviews.author: S. President

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted to memorialize our beloved dog. It is just the right size and a quality design. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when our dog passed away. The kids loves having this in our garden. It was smaller then I expected it to be but it was perfect. I was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: A great way to remember your pet
customer_reviews.text: We proudly display this in our front yard. Thank you for making a difficult time in our lives one that we can now look back on fondly and talk to Buddy when we see this.
customer_reviews.author: jay gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Very nice memorial
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Not super heavy but looks very nice. I did spray polyurethane on mine before putting it outside. Had it about a month and it's looking good.
customer_reviews.author: R. LUCAS

customer_reviews.title: Nice grave site marker
customer_reviews.text: This stone was used as a "tomb" marker for my dog. The stone is very well built, not very big, but looks very nice among a bed of flowers. The dog looks like my Springer Spaniel when she used to curl up and nap. My dog is buried in my yard under a bed of flowers. Beautiful stone.
customer_reviews.author: JGM

customer_reviews.title: Family didn't like it because it did not resemble a German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Family didn't like it because it did not resemble a German Shepherd. Would have been better if you could have chosen breed. Just a suggestion. Other wise we liked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Bloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Memorial appears much smaller in person than the picture, but the dimensions posted are accurate. It has only be outside for nearly two months, so I'm curious to see if it withstands fluctuating temperatures and precipitation. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little memorial stone
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to sit on a bench under a tree in our backyard along with a couple of personalized granite memorial stones. We're very pleased with the detail.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to show my pup that I love him even though he is gone.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaHanes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice memorial stone
customer_reviews.text: This is a very life-like sculpture that helps us memorialize the loss of our pet.
customer_reviews.author: reddogmom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good size and lettering nice.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. Light beige color with easily seen lettering.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Akard

customer_reviews.title: would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I read as many reviews as I could before buying this. I have to say for the $22.00 dollars that I bought this, it's worth the money. It is smaller then I thought it would be but this is a beautiful memorial statue ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift, recipient said it was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but a nice memorial to my beloved Cinnamon. It looks nice in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice memorial!
customer_reviews.text: I have this sitting by my back door and it reminds me of my beloved dog!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the mememorial
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for my buddy i see it every day. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cummings

customer_reviews.title: The beautiful statue looks just like my Bear that recently passed
customer_reviews.text: The beautiful statue looks just like my Bear that recently passed. I was looking for something special to remember him by, and I found it. Thank you, Sad mama Bear
customer_reviews.author: ECaulfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet gift for someone grieving a pet. Could be an indoor or outdoor piece.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Love the saying on it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but smaller than I thought it would be. Love the saying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla C Butchko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought it for a friend and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in our time of grief
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful...it was perfect for putting over our dog Jake's grave...the dog on the statue also looks just like him...this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: shannon dupee

customer_reviews.title: Memorial stone very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The memorial stone was as expected. Hi tech a little difficult to track shipment and had to email twice and still never was able to track. But important thing is that I got it and it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: place to go to , to visit my beloved lab
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn  Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: This memory stone is great for outdoor garden.
customer_reviews.text: The 3D dog on the stone is awesome and the words written are meaningful. Great for my memory garden. This is a stone I will always treasure.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't read the writing blurry will be returning for refund
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Father’s Day and he loved it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: They loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected! Have to my son and his family as a memorial for my grand dog. They loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: kpstl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great stone that is placed with our memorial to our lab! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LRT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material, perfect for outdoor use. Purchased for the harden and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: NINA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and the message on it it's so heart felt
customer_reviews.author: maria medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Really looks good over my dog's
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I wanted . Really looks good over my dog's grave
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was what I was looking for...thank you for caring it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hoyt

product_meta.title: Hi-Tech Pet Memorial Stones Dog (Original Version) (Original Version)
product_meta.description:
Keep the memory of a lost pet alive in your heart with this Pet Memorial Stone. It reads, "You have left our lives but will never leave our hearts" and features a 3-D dog or cat resting on top of the stone. Create a memorial garden in your backyard and place this stone amidst the flowers and greenery. Approx. 8-3/4"W x 7-3/4"D x 3-1/4"H. Cold cast ceramic.

Details:
Approx. 8-3/4"W x 7-3/4"D x 3-1/4"H
Cold cast ceramic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
